title: Halloween Tricks & Treats 2013 (gnv64)
description:
Halloween Tricks & Treats 2013 (Better Homes & Gardens Special issue)

CONTENTS
8 posh pumpkins
Stencil, scribble, and circle your pumpkins with stylish no-carve designs for fashion-forward decor.
